name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A dagger with a dark aura, known to grant its wielder stealth and agility.
looks: The dagger is made of black steel, with intricate carvings along the blade. It gives off a faint purple glow.

special_weapon_skills.stealth: Increases stealth and allows the wielder to move silently.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Has a chance to deal bonus dark damage and stun the target.

name: Lightning Bolt Staff
description: A staff that channels the power of lightning to unleash devastating attacks.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak wood and is adorned with intricate carvings of lightning bolts. It crackles with electricity when wielded.

special_weapon_skills.lightning_magic: Allows the player to cast lightning-based spells with increased power and accuracy.

special_effects.shock: Has a chance to shock enemies, temporarily stunning them.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A sword imbued with magical energy.
looks: The sword has a blade made of shimmering silver and a hilt adorned with enchanted gems.

special_weapon_skills.Sword Mastery: Increases damage and critical strike chance with swords.

special_effects.Flameburst: Chance on hit to unleash a burst of fiery energy, dealing additional fire damage.

name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength and melee damage.
looks: The potion is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy.

name: Slow Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores health points.
looks: A small, glass vial filled with a glowing, green liquid.

name: Ice Axe
description: A sturdy ice axe designed for climbing icy terrain.
looks: The ice axe has a long metal shaft with a curved pick on one end and a spike on the other.

name: Giant's Ring
description: A ring that grants the wearer incredible strength.
looks: The ring is made of solid gold and has a large gemstone embedded in the center.

name: Energy Shard
description: A shard of pure energy that can be used to restore mana.
looks: The shard is a small, transparent crystal that emits a soft glow.

name: Swift Boots
description: A pair of boots that enhance the wearer's speed and agility.
looks: These boots are made of fine leather and feature intricate stitching. They have a sleek design and are jet black in color.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A powerful scroll that allows the caster to unleash a fiery explosion.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment with intricate runes inscribed on it.

special_effects.Explosion: Causes a large explosion, damaging enemies in the area.
